narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Crown Heights Medical P.c. is a Clinic/Center  Multi-Specialty provider based in Monsey, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $56.6M in Medicaid payments across 1.7M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $56.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
